text: Detto Mariano (born Mariano Detto; 27 July 1937 – 25 March 2020) was an Italian musician. He was also a composer, arranger, lyricist, pianist and record producer. His career started in 1958. He is best known as a member of I Ribelli. He was born in Monte Urano, Marche. On 25 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Mariano died in Milan due to COVID-19. He was 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Milan Category:21st- century Italian composers Category:Italian songwriters Category:Italian pianists Category:Italian record producers Category:Movie score composers Category:20th-century Italian composers Category:People from Marche
title: Detto Mariano
